task.description: Perform an automated code review on recently implemented changes and provide actionable feedback before the changes are merged

requirements.requirement: Analyze diffs or pull requests to identify potential issues
Check for adherence to existing architecture and coding standards
Highlight areas that would benefit from additional tests
Suggest refactoring opportunities or improvements in readability
Ensure documentation is updated where necessary

instructions.instruction: Retrieve the latest code changes or pull request diff
Gather context from the associated issue or state documentation
Load relevant coding standards and style guides

phase.output: Complete understanding of the change scope and standards to apply

instructions.instruction: Inspect the diff for logic errors, anti-patterns, and complexity
Verify tests cover new or changed code paths
Check for documentation updates and consistency
Compare with similar existing implementations for alignment

phase.output: List of identified issues and potential improvements

instructions.instruction: Provide inline comments or notes for specific code sections
Suggest follow-up tasks for missing tests or docs

phase.output: Actionable feedback ready for the developer or automation pipeline

important_guidelines.guideline: Focus on improving quality without blocking progress
Respect the existing codebase patterns and decision history
